name: Calling Of A Hero
description:
Embark on a journey to save Earth......

You, a simple man have been chosen by the Goddess of Peace and Goddess of Life to save Earth from a dangerous threat that arrives soon. You will meet new people, face new challenges and fight a variety of mutated monsters.

Will you be able to save Earth or will you let it succumb to the threat. A long journey awaits you.

PS: Version is 0.1 and there is not a lot of content but through your feedback I can continue making this game, your suggestions are greatly appreciated.
